description.narrative: IR20: Awareness on and demand for education increased among disadvantaged groups, especially girls in at least 20 deprived districts, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 005 : The needs of out-of-school children aged 6-14 years, especially girls, children with special needs and OVCs are systematically assessed and addressed in disadvantaged areas in five focus regions

title.narrative: IR20: Awareness on and demand for education increased among disadvantaged groups, especially girls in at least 20 deprived districts

description.narrative: Prioritization of adolescent girls' education through development of draft guidelines on addressing teenage pregnancy among school-going girls; training manual on gender in education and gender in pre-tertiary education policy. 20 districts implemented Communication for Development activities, reaching 9000 stakeholders on right-age enrolment and increased community engagement. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:21/12/2017
